data.actual_result: The Windows Taskbar is still visible if its placed at the bottom of the screen. (Submitted for <@97947249690030080>)
data.expected_result: The whole window should be covered.
data.short_description: If you full screen a YouTube link within Discord, it doesn't cover the whole screen, and the Windows Taskbar is still showing, preventing the bottom video options to be visible.
data.steps_to_repro: - Link a video and try and watch it in fullscreen.
